snippet: The appeal is the first of several in same-sex marriage cases likely to reach the Supreme Court in coming months.
abstract: Utah officials ask Supreme Court to hear their appeal of ruling striking down their state’s ban on same-sex marriage, which voters adopted in 2004.
lead_paragraph: The appeal is the first of several in same-sex marriage cases likely to reach the Supreme Court in coming months.

headline.main: Utah Officials Ask Justices to Hear Appeal of Ruling on Gay Marriage Ban
headline.print_headline: Utah Officials Ask Justices to Hear Appeal of Ruling on Gay Marriage Ban

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
